actions.text: Amendment SA 105 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 105 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Brown OH to Amendment SA 32. (consideration: CR S827-828; text: CR S827) To improve the provisions relating to integrating unmanned aerial systems into the National Airspace System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 105 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 105 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Brown OH to Amendment SA 32.

amends_amendment.purpose: A bill to improve provisions relating to certification and flight standards for military remotely piloted aerial systems in the National Airspace System.

purpose: To improve the provisions relating to integrating unmanned aerial systems into the National Airspace System.
